title: Prinsesstårta
description: This Swedish layer cake is great fun - bright green and full of custard, jam, marzipan, and a mound of whipped cream! Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a piping bag with a 1cm/½in plain nozzle, a medium star nozzle, a 23cm/9in springform tin and a sugar thermometer.
ingredients: 1 vanilla pod, split in half lengthways and seeded scraped out
250g/9oz icing sugar, plus extra for dusting
green food colouring paste (do not use liquid food colouring)
